turkish_example_sentence: Sen geçen hafta sonu arkadaşlarınla Cappadocia'ya gidecektin.
english_example_sentence: You were going to go to Cappadocia with your friends last weekend.
russian_example_sentence: Ты собирался поехать в Каппадокию со своими друзьями в прошлые выходные.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen geçen hafta sonu arkadaşlarınla Cappadocia'ya ______.
